topic.title: Installing agent on Windows using VBS script
topic.shortdesc: How to install the agent under Windows using a VBS script

body.p: The project provides a VBS script to deploy agents in a silent way: http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-agent/wiki/Vbs_install_upgrade
To use it, you need to adjust some variables :

ol.li: versionverification : the exact version of the agent that needs to be installed on the computer. If the version is not present, or a less recent, the new one will be installed ;

fusionarguments : command line arguments to perform a silent installation. Please refer to this page to have the complete list of switchs : http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-agent/wiki/Command_Line_parameters_to_install_FusionInventory_Agent_on_Windows ;
fusionsetupfile : path to the FusionInventory-Agent setup file ;
uninstallocsagent : tells the script to uninstall any existing OCS Agent on the computer or not.
